c1.name: Clarity of Heart
c1.effect: **Spring Spirit Summoning** can be used 1 more time.

c2.name: Centered Spirit
c2.effect: **Divine Maiden's Deliverance** lasts for 6 seconds longer. Active characters within the skill's field deal 15% increased Cryo CRIT DMG.

c3.name: Seclusion
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Spring Spirit Summoning** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Insight
c4.effect:
When characters under the effect of **Icy Quill** applied by Shenhe trigger its DMG Bonus effects, Shenhe will gain a Skyfrost Mantra stack:
· When Shenhe uses **Spring Spirit Summoning**, she will consume all stacks of Skyfrost Mantra, increasing the DMG of that Spring Spirit Summoning by 5% for each stack consumed.
· Max 50 stacks. Stacks last for 60s.

c5.name: Divine Attainment
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Divine Maiden's Deliverance** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Mystical Abandon
c6.effect: When characters trigger **Icy Quill**'s effects using Normal and Charged Attack DMG, it does not count toward the Trigger Quota.
